name: Japanese Reading
description: Reading Japanesehelps you practice your hiragana, katakana and Kanji reading skills.  - In-app dictionary, one-click definitions - Completely free - New articles almost daily - Real-life news from NHK - Easy Japanese language - N3-N4 level, for intermediate Japanese learners - Hiragana, Katakana - Kanji, all with furigana  Get into the habit of practising reading Japanese daily. Its just a small step to start.
